channel.title: Staff meeting

item.title: Staff meeting
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“SandScape, post:8, topic:260487”][quote author=ricky james link=topic=343922.msg2656326#msg2656326 date=1233887712]

[quote author=SandScape link=topic=343922.msg2655619#msg2655619 date=1233845699]

[quote author=FusionLord link=topic=343922.msg2655570#msg2655570 date=1233840939]
ok i have this command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffmeeting") && playerRights >= 4) { // 4 = Owner
 for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { 
   if(p != null) {
    if(p.playerRights >= 2) { // 2 = Moderator 1 = new rank called NOOB
       p.teleportToX = absX;
       p.teleportToY = absY;
} 
} 
} 
}

and i would like a diaglogbox to pop up asking
“Would you like to attend this meeting”
anyone know how to make this happen
and the staff can pick yes or no
[/quote]you guys kill me with this you guys ask for the same thing maybe try searching for it on forums beofre you post theres about 4 xtelestaff help request and they already hekped so maybe loking before posting
[/quote]Sand he can’t kill you,FYI most people do search or else they wouldn’t post here. so please stop being a dick about it.
[/quote]no im sure he didnt search on the forums for this because it was posted yesterday and this was posted yesterday around the same time so search the forums before you post your problems and maybe youll find it and ricky james dude please shut up[/quote]Fuck you.

Set up an npc dialogue, and use p.npcdialogue = #

And use:

       teleportToX = absX;
       teleportToY = absY;

For the yes.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
